text: Hi Duncan, does that include email?

Hi everyone, Raka is looking to hire a full-time web developer with a solid background in HubSpot, strong front-end development skills, as well as WordPress related development experience. Along with building, maintaining, and optimizing websites on the HubSpot platform and helping to build out our code library, you’ll also work with clients to provide support and educate them on processes or specific technologies.
If you’re interested or know anyone who might be, feel free to send me a DM! You can find more information <https://raka.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=28|here> as well.
Thanks!
